Classes in com.googlecode.sarasvati used by com.googlecode.sarasvati
Arc
          Arcs describe the relationships between Nodes.
ArcToken
          Arc tokens point to arcs in the graph.
ArcTokenSetMember
          Extends the TokenSetMember interface to narrow the Token to an ArcToken.
CustomNode
          CustomNode provides a superclass for user defined nodes that are portable across all engines.
CustomNodeWrapper
          This interface represents a Node which will provide an adapter for instances of CustomNode, bridging the gap between a backend specific Node implementation, such as HibNode or MemNode, and the backend agnostic CustomNode.
Engine
          An Engine executes a process.
ExecutionType
          Specifies the different execution types.
External
          When an external is defined in a process definition, custom attributes may be defined.
Graph
          A Graph corresponds to a process definition.
GraphProcess
          A GraphProcess represents a currently executing workflow graph.
GuardAction
          A GuardAction is part of the response from a Node guard.
GuardResult
          A GuardResult is returned from Node.guard(Engine, NodeToken) to indicate what should be done with an incoming NodeToken.
JoinAction
          A GuardAction is part of the response from a Node guard.
JoinResult
          Encapsulates the results of a join attempt.
JoinStrategy
          Encapsulates a strategy for determining if a node is ready to execute.
JoinType
          Enumerates the types of joins.
Node
          A node corresponds to an action in a process definition.
NodeToken
          Node tokens point to nodes in the graph.
NodeTokenSetMember
          Extends the TokenSetMember interface to narrow the Token to a NodeToken.
ProcessState
          Contains the valid states that a GraphProcess may have.
Token
          The set of tokens in a process represent the current state of the workflow.
TokenSet
          A token set is way of associating tokens together and allowing them to have state relative to one another.
TokenSetMember
          Represents the link between a Token and TokenSet.
